objects.specification: A light-colored, durable linoleum floor covering spanning the room area, with a smooth matte finish and subtle neutral pattern that complements a classroom environment.
Smooth vertical wall segment painted in a soft neutral tone, with a flat uniform finish suitable for an indoor classroom setting.
Smooth vertical wall segment painted in a soft neutral tone, with a flat uniform finish suitable for an indoor classroom setting.
Smooth vertical wall segment painted in a soft neutral tone, with a flat uniform finish suitable for an indoor classroom setting.
Smooth vertical wall segment painted in a soft neutral tone, with a flat uniform finish suitable for an indoor classroom setting.
A sturdy wooden door with a simple design and a smooth painted surface, featuring a metal handle and minimal trim.
A rectangular window with clear transparent glass panes set in a slim white frame, providing natural light into the room.
Light fabric curtains in a pastel hue, with gentle folds and a soft texture that can be drawn to cover the window.
A large rectangular teacher’s desk crafted from dark wood with a rich grain finish, featuring a smooth flat top surface and sturdy legs, with subtle beveled edges.
A chair with a dark wood frame and a cushioned seat and back upholstered in a muted tone, providing ergonomic support and matching the teacher’s desk.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface and a slim aluminum frame, mounted on the wall.
A circular analog wall clock with a white face, black numerals, and a minimalist frame, suitable for classroom decor.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white plastic housing and a front lens, designed for projecting images onto the whiteboard.
A recessed LED ceiling light panel with a slim white housing and a diffused cover for even illumination.
A recessed LED ceiling light panel with a slim white housing and a diffused cover for even illumination.

A tall wooden bookshelf with multiple open shelves filled with a variety of colored books, featuring a simple solid wood frame.

A laminated educational poster depicting informative content with vibrant colors, mounted flat against the wall.

A potted indoor plant with broad green leaves in a simple ceramic pot, adding a natural decorative touch to the corner.
A simple cylindrical plastic waste bin with an open top and smooth matte finish, suitable for classroom waste disposal.
A simple cylindrical plastic waste bin with an open top and smooth matte finish, suitable for classroom waste disposal.
